Introduction

The Jet Engine Blade Scan [JEBS] is a comprehensive inspection solution using computer vision, AI analysis, and precision measurement technology.

For more information, visit our Google Drive folder.

Blade Inspection Details

Blade: E8172-12

Measurement: N

Actual Vertical Offset: 1.40 mm

Measured (Photo): 2.33 mm

Measured (Caliper): 2.37 mm

Acceptable Range: 2.28 - 2.58 mm

Status: Acceptable
